name: Approval
description: Contains methods for processing approval requests and setting approval-process locks and unlocks on records.

islocked(id).name: isLocked
islocked(id).description: Returns true if the record with the ID id is locked, or false if it’s not.

islocked(list).name: isLocked
islocked(list).description: Returns a map of record IDs to lock statuses. If the record is locked the status is true. If the record is not locked the status is false.

islocked(sobject).name: isLocked
islocked(sobject).description: Returns true if the sobject record is locked, or false if it’s not.

lock(id).name: lock
lock(id).description: Locks an object, and returns the lock results.

lock(list).name: lock
lock(list).description: Locks a set of objects, with the option for partial success. It returns the lock results, including failures.

lock(sobject).name: lock
lock(sobject).description: Locks an object, and returns the lock results.

lock(id,boolean).name: lock
lock(id,boolean).signature: public static Approval.LockResult lock(Id recordId, Boolean allOrNothing)
lock(id,boolean).description: Locks an object, with the option for partial success, and returns the lock result.

lock(sobject,boolean).name: lock
lock(sobject,boolean).signature: public static Approval.LockResult lock(SObject recordToLock, Boolean allOrNothing)
lock(sobject,boolean).description: Locks an object, with the option for partial success, and returns the lock result.

process(approval.processrequest).name: process
process(approval.processrequest).description: Submits a new approval request and approves or rejects existing approval requests.

process(approval.processrequest,boolean).name: process
process(approval.processrequest,boolean).signature: public static void process(Approval.ProcessRequest approvalRequest, Boolean allOrNone)
process(approval.processrequest,boolean).description: Submits a new approval request and approves or rejects existing approval requests.

process(approval.processrequest[]).name: process
process(approval.processrequest[]).description: Submits a list of new approval requests, and approves or rejects existing approval requests.

process(approval.processrequest[],boolea.name: process
process(approval.processrequest[],boolea.signature: public static void process(Approval.ProcessRequest[] approvalRequests, Boolean allOrNone)
process(approval.processrequest[],boolea.description: Submits a list of new approval requests, and approves or rejects existing approval requests.

unlock(id).name: unlock
unlock(id).description: Unlocks an object, and returns the unlock results.

unlock(list).name: unlock
unlock(list).description: Unlocks a set of objects, with the option for partial success. It returns the unlock results, including failures.

unlock(sobject).name: unlock
unlock(sobject).description: Unlocks an object, and returns the unlock results.

unlock(id,boolean).name: unlock
unlock(id,boolean).signature: public static Approval.UnlockResult unlock(Id recordId, Boolean allOrNothing)
unlock(id,boolean).description: Unlocks an object, with the option for partial success, and returns the unlock result.

unlock(sobject,boolean).name: unlock
unlock(sobject,boolean).signature: public static Approval.UnlockResult unlock(SObject recordToUnlock, Boolean allOrNothing)
unlock(sobject,boolean).description: Unlocks an object, with the option for partial success, and returns the unlock result.
